name: fs-extra
description: fs-extra contains methods that aren't included in the vanilla Node.js fs package. Such as recursive mkdir, copy, and remove.

10.1.0.name: fs-extra
10.1.0.description: fs-extra contains methods that aren't included in the vanilla Node.js fs package. Such as recursive mkdir, copy, and remove.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
